name: Tabs: Safari 4 Way (Firefox 4+)
description:
*** This style is designed to work with the CrApple theme ***

Due to a few requests (and my own desire), I have decided to modify style 18681 to match the color changes in Firefox 3.6 (and up) for Mac OS X Snow Leopard.

This style modifies the tabs to mimic those of Safari 4.
